description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addresses the nation through his Radio Address, Mann Ki Baat. This month's episode sees citizens from various corners of the nation addressing their questions and sug
caption: soundcloud.com
message:
Today's #MannKiBaat…on Khadi, Gujarat & Haryana's initiative towards Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao, Start up India & more. 

Talked about innovative start ups by our youth. Continue sharing about start ups on the App. Enterprise of our youth makes me proud. https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modis-mann-ki-baat-january-2016
